name: A Journey
description:
A Journey is a self-reflection "game".  A Journey is about the path most of us walk in life.  There is nothing inherently wrong with this path, but it is the safe and average path. 

We graduate college not sure what we want to do.  We could pursue a passion or hobby.  However, when the money runs out, a lot of us  gravitate to a a career, get married, have kids, get a mortgage, retire then die.     

In A Journey, you follow a guy walking this path.
